text: Vitry-sur-Seine is a town and commune in the southeast suburb of Paris, France. It is in the ÃŽle-de-France region and the Val-de-Marne department. About 79,000 people lived there in 1999. == Twin towns == * Burnley (UK), since 1958 until 1974 and since 1995 * Kladno (Czech Republic), since 1966 * Meissen (Germany), since 1973 Category:Communes in Val-de-Marne
